comments.author: Queentoshi
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on August 17, 2023, 04:06:49 AMIs there any real place from where we can get jobs from other countries. You mean working remotely from your country for another company in another country. You will have to possess serious and valuable skills to be considered for this kind of jobs. If there are many other people who can do what you do, that is the service you provide to the company, they will be more interested in employing someone from their own country even if they will work from home than someone who is another country and wants to work from home. To get these kinds of jobs, you have to develop your skills to an extent that you are sort after and put yourself out there for consideration.

comments.author: Radek4921
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on August 17, 2023, 04:06:49 AMIs there any real place from where we can get jobs from other countries. If you get a job in a company then it is possible to manage the visa?I don't think this necessarily applies to the bitcoin forum. More suitable for a forum about making money and the like. However, if you want to find a job in another country, I think nowadays there are many possibilities to contact a specific company, there are many - in the industry you are interested in and just ask if it is possible. They may be able to handle all the formalities, but it may depend on the particular company. Nowadays, remote work is also very popular, but often you have to be physically in a given country to work, i.e. you cannot work for a company branch in England, e.g. from China. Of course, as I mentioned earlier, everyone has their own work policy and it's best to check it by contacting specific companies.

If you get a job in a company then it is possible to manage the visa?Given your mention of a Visa, I assume this job would involve in-person work. I believe such an arrangement is possible, and the company might even provide assistance. Additionally, I assume that your initial salary payment method would be in Bitcoin, correct? While there are online companies that offer the setup you're seeking, it's crucial to proceed cautiously. Always verify their legitimacy before getting involved. Unfortunately, there have been numerous cases of job seekers falling victim to fraud when pursuing jobs abroad, so it's important to stay vigilant.
